description.0: An ancient longsword discovered in the Blackcliff Forge that cuts through rocks like a hot knife through butter.

0.0: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by <cryo>4%</cryo> for 6s. Max 4 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s.

1.0: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by <cryo>5%</cryo> for 6s. Max 4 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s.

2.0: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by <cryo>6%</cryo> for 6s. Max 4 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s.

3.0: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by <cryo>7%</cryo> for 6s. Max 4 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s.

4.0: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by <cryo>8%</cryo> for 6s. Max 4 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s.
